text: Fagopyrum is a genus of Polygonaceae Adriana Sanchez, Tanja M. Schuster, Janelle M. Burke and Kathleen A. Kron 2011. Taxonomy of Polygonoideae (Polygonaceae): A new tribal classification Taxon 60: 151-160. ==Taxa== F tibeticum (A.J. Li) Adr.Sanchez et Jan.M.Burke (Parapteropyrum tibeticum A. J. Li in Acta Phytotax. Sin. 19 (3): 330. t. 9. 1981) ==References== ==Other websites== Xinmin Tian et al. 2011 On the origin of the woody buckwheat Fagopyrum tibeticum (=Parapteropyrum tibeticum) in the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau Molec Phylogenetics and Evol. 61(2):515-20 Yasui Y. and Ohnishi O. 1998 Phylogenetic relationships among Fagopyrum species revealed by the nucleotide sequences of the ITS region of the nuclear rRNA gene Genes genetic syst 73:201-210 PDF Category:Polygonaceae
title: Fagopyrum tibeticum
